body:
### Welcome to the ελληνικά Language Page.

You probably noticed on the [Phoenician](http://language.github.com) page that the Greek characters also had a number. the previously unmentioned  ελληνικά symbols are used only as numbers, along with koppa ϟ (90)

* digamma (6) ϛ "stigma"
* sampi (900) ϡ

### Alphabet
todo

### Numerals
todo

### Support or Contact

If you are having difficulty with Unicode in your computer programs, contact mike@dene.ca and we’ll help you sort it out.
name: ελληνικά

tagline: this is all Greek to me
